snippet.title: Search for missing father and son
snippet.content: POLICE hold concerns for the welfare for a father and son who were last seen in Margaret River on Friday afternoon. Jacob Raymond Costar, 29, and his son Ethan,9, were last seen at the Watershed Winery around 12.30pm Friday. They were travelling in a silver Holden Commodore sedan but that vehicle was later found abandoned in Margaret River. Police said it is not known whether they are using another vehicle. Police and SES volunteers are continuing their search for the pair. Anyone that might have seen the pair in Margaret River or surrounding areas has been asked to contact Police immediately on 131 444.
